attributes.action: call for Patricia Hewitt to clean a hospital ward randomley selected by a Mr G Mardlin a victim of MRSA to be cleaned on day of hospital selection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to help Patricia Hewitt understand and see first hand how dirty and dangerous UK NHS hospitals are. The random selection and cleaning of a hospital is to prevent cleaning staff doing a thorough job on the day, before Patricia Hewitt attempts to clean it.
